name: Wordplay (randomnovice)
description:
Wordplay is an educational game for young children.

The different gamemodes are:

  • Say It! (A-Z flashcards, eight different categories)
  • Spot It! (Click on the picture that matches the word. Approx. age 1-2 year olds)
  • Rhyme It! (Choose the two words that rhyme. Approx. age 3+ year olds)
  • Hear It! (Distinguish between similar sounding words e.g. lock, block, clock, rock. Approx. age 3+ year olds)
  • Fred It! (Drag the phonemes into the correct order. Approx. age 4+ year olds)
  • Spell It! (Spell the word. Approx. age 5+ year olds)
  • Play It! (Five questions each from Rhyme It!, Hear It!, Fred It! and Spell It!)
